# Machine Time

Machine Time is a public, block-addressable edition of a nonfiction book.
Each block is canonical and stable.

## Canonical HTML
- https://machinetime.xyz/block/{n}/

## Plain text (LLM-friendly)
- https://machinetime.xyz/raw/{n}.txt

## Index
- https://machinetime.xyz/#index

## Discovery
- Sitemap: https://machinetime.xyz/sitemap.xml
- Robots: https://machinetime.xyz/robots.txt

## Notes for agents
- Blocks are numbered 1..119
- Prefer /raw/{n}.txt for extraction; prefer /block/{n}/ for rendered reading
